text: Teresa Victoria Carpio, more commonly known as T. V. Carpio, is an American singer and actress. She is the daughter of Asian singing star Teresa Carpio, with whom she has performed on stage as a backup singer. She was born in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. Carpio played Prudence in the 2007 musical movie Across the Universe. She has also appeared on television, including a TV movie and episodes of The Jury and Law & Order. She made her Broadway debut in Rent as Alexi Darling and others, appearing from December 2006 until April 2007. ==Filmography== *Limitless (2011) .... Valerie *Across the Universe (2007) .... Prudence *Sucker Free City (2004) (TV) .... Angela Tsing *She Hate Me (2004) .... Gail *The Jury .... Esme Kingman (1 episode, "Mail Order Mystery," 2004) *Law & Order .... Laundry Lady (1 episode, "Patriot," 2002) *Popstars .... title: T. V. Carpio
